revised_title: Demographic Analysis of the Island of Madeira
tldr: Dr. Thomas Heberden conducted a demographic study of the inhabitants of the Island of Madeira, analyzing population growth, mortality rates, and other factors. He found that the population had increased at a rate of 1.0082% per annum and that the mortality rate was influenced by seasonal factors. This study provides valuable insights into the population dynamics of the time.
